articles.title: NCAA volleyball tournament 2022 - bracket breakdown and preview - ESPN
articles.description: Top seed Texas seeks its first title since 2012, but the Longhorns have plenty of competition. We look at the top contenders and players to watch.
articles.content:
Texas is seeking its first college volleyball championship since 2012, and if the Longhorns are to win it all, they will do so as the No. 1 overall seed in the NCAA tournament.
